channel.title: 80808 samples and /shared
channel.description:
Hi folks, I'm toying around with making a drum machine and tried the 80808 patch. It's failing to find samples to upload to the sdcard. Where should these samples come from? and where is this "shared" folder meant to be?
Generate code complete Creating directory on sdcard : /80808 Done creating directory Changing working directory on sdcard : /80808 file error: FR_NO_FILESYSTEM, filename:"/80808" Done changing working directory Start get file info : /shared/808/bd.raw file error: FR_NO_FILESYSTEM, filename:"/80808" Done getting file info

item.title: 80808 samples and /shared
item.dc:creator: @janvantomme Jan Vantomme
item.description:
@janvantomme wrote:

Those 808 samples were part of the firmware, but it's possible that these have been removed, and that these objects are obsolete now. Best thing is to use the wave/play fn object and load your own samples.

Read full topic
